description: This API is identical to GetTemporaryTableCredentials except that this is used when the target Data Catalog resource is of type Partition. Lake Formation restricts the permission of the vended credentials with the same scope down policy which restricts access to a single Amazon S3 prefix.

parameters.name: TableArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the partitions' table.

parameters.name: Partition
parameters.description: A list of partition values identifying a single partition. The list of partition values. (string) ---

parameters.name: Permissions
parameters.description: Filters the request based on the user having been granted a list of specified permissions on the requested resource(s). (string) ---

parameters.name: AuditContext
parameters.description: A structure representing context to access a resource (column names, query ID, etc). AdditionalAuditContext (string) --- The filter engine can populate the --AdditionalAuditContext' information with the request ID for you to track. This information will be displayed in CloudTrail log in your account.

nested_params.name: AdditionalAuditContext
nested_params.description: The filter engine can populate the --AdditionalAuditContext' information with the request ID for you to track. This information will be displayed in CloudTrail log in your account.

parameters.name: SupportedPermissionTypes
parameters.description: A list of supported permission types for the partition. Valid values are COLUMN_PERMISSION and CELL_FILTER_PERMISSION. (string) ---

nested_items.name: AccessKeyId
nested_items.description: The access key ID for the temporary credentials.

nested_items.name: SecretAccessKey
nested_items.description: The secret key for the temporary credentials.

nested_items.name: SessionToken
nested_items.description: The session token for the temporary credentials.

nested_items.name: Expiration
nested_items.description: The date and time when the temporary credentials expire.
